modification_details.change: Added aria-label="Open notifications" to IconButton component
modification_details.impact: Improves accessibility for screen reader users on notification button

modification_details.change: Added aria-label="Open profile menu" to IconButton component
modification_details.impact: Improves accessibility for screen reader users on profile menu button

patterns_discovered.description: Adding ARIA labels to interactive icon buttons to provide screen reader context
patterns_discovered.best_practice: Icon-only buttons should always have descriptive aria-label attributes

patterns_discovered.description: Focused, targeted improvements to specific accessibility issues rather than broad refactoring
patterns_discovered.benefit: Reduced risk, easier to review, clear audit trail

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added aria-label attributes to both icon buttons in Header component. Implementation was straightforward and completed on first attempt with no rework needed.

recommendations.recommendation: Verify aria-label text is consistent across similar components throughout the application
recommendations.rationale: Ensures uniform accessibility experience and messaging patterns

recommendations.recommendation: Add accessibility testing to verify aria-labels are properly exposed to screen readers
recommendations.rationale: Automated accessibility tests can catch missing or incorrect ARIA attributes

recommendations.recommendation: Apply similar aria-label additions to other icon-only buttons throughout the codebase
recommendations.rationale: Other components likely have the same accessibility gap as the Header component had
